description: GitHub Project cache for Portfolio Site - schibelli.dev project management
purpose: Stores GitHub Project metadata for automation scripts and project tracking

configurable.note: Project number can be updated via environment variable GITHUB_PROJECT_NUMBER if needed

number.description: GitHub project number must be a positive integer

url.description: URL must match GitHub projects format

description.description: Description must be between 10 and 500 characters

errorCodes.INVALID_NUMBER: Project number must be a valid positive integer
errorCodes.INVALID_URL: URL must match GitHub projects format
errorCodes.MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD: Required field is missing or empty

documentation.schema: This JSON file stores GitHub Project metadata for automation scripts
documentation.usage: Used by project management automation to track and update project information
documentation.maintenance: Update lastUpdated field when making changes to project configuration
